name: Chewie, Enraged (V)
Lore: 'Smuggler. Very few people need to be told that angry Wookiees should be given a wide berth.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While present at a site with Han or Leia, Chewie is Heroic and, unless hit, may be forfeited to satisfy all remaining attrition and battle damage against you. Once per game, may take Kashyyyk or Falcon into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
